content: PBH SD CRC M1 Self-drilling sheathing screws Collated exterior sheathing screw (corrosion-resistant coating) for SD-M 1 or SD-M 2 for fastening exterior sheathing boards to metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed for use with SD-M 1 and SD-M 2 magazines and SD 4500-A22 and SD 4500 drivers High fastening frequency – get more done in less time Hilti has full control of the manufacturing process – delivering reliable, consistent quality All Hilti drill-point drywall screws meet or exceed ASTM C 954 performance requirements Corrosion resistance tested in 1000 hours of salt-spray testing as per ASTM B117 Applications Fastening exterior sheathing boards to metal studs (20-14 ga) Fastening fiberglass-faced panel boards to metal studs (20-14 ga) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Bugle head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Screw head type | Bugle head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | Yes, compatible with SD-M 1 screw magazine, Yes, compatible with SD-M 2 screw magazine | Product Class | Premium | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 20 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution ### ITEMS- 2071040 - Drywall screw 6 x 1-1/4 PBH SD CRC M1 - Package Size 8000 pc - 3511859 - Coll. screw pkg 1-1/4 PBH SD CRC M1 1/2 pall - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 144000x Drywall screw 6 x 1-1/4 PBH SD CRC M1 - 1x Screw magazine SD-M 1 02 - 5x Power bit 81/3-1/4 S-SY PH2 5 pk for SD-M1 - 3546334 - 6x1-1/4 PBH SD CRC M1 1/2 Pal SDM2+Bits - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 144000x Drywall screw 6 x 1-1/4 PBH SD CRC M1 - 1x Screw Magazine SD-M 2 02 - 5x Driver bit S-SY PH2 102/4 (5) for SD-M2 - 3649288 - 1-1/4PBH SD CRC M1 1/2 Pal SDM2+DWA - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 144000x Drywall screw 6 x 1-1/4 PBH SD CRC M1 - 1x Screw Magazine SD-M 2 02 - 5x Driver bit S-SY PH2 153/6 (5) for SD DWA - 1x Adapter SD-DWA - 3511868 - Coll. screw pkg 1-1/4 PBH SD CRC M1 pall - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 288000x Drywall screw 6 x 1-1/4 PBH SD CRC M1 - 2x Screw magazine SD-M 1 02 - 10x Power bit 81/3-1/4 S-SY PH2 5 pk for SD-M1 - 3546333 - 6x1-1/4 PBH SD CRC M1 Pal SDM2 + Bits - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 288000x Drywall screw 6 x 1-1/4 PBH SD CRC M1 - 2x Screw Magazine SD-M 2 02 - 10x Driver bit S-SY PH2 102/4 (10) for SD-M2 - 3649314 - 1-1/4PBH SD CRC M1 Pallet SDM2+DWA - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 288000x Drywall screw 6 x 1-1/4 PBH SD CRC M1 - 2x Screw Magazine SD-M 2 02 - 10x Driver bit S-SY PH2 153/6 (5) for SD DWA - 2x Adapter SD-DWA - 2133713 - Drywall screw 6x1 7/8 PBH SD CRC M1 - Package Size 4000 pc - 3872263 - 1-7/8 PBH SD CRC M1 1/2 PALLET SDM2 - Package Size 1 pc - 3872283 - 1-7/8 PBH SD CRC M1 1/2PAL SDM2 +DWA -
